record.description: The 82-inch reflecting telescope at the McDonald Observatory awaits the arrival of its mirror. Warner and Swasey Company designed and built both the observatory, in the Davis Mountains of Western Texas, and its telescope, the second largest in the world.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Dept. of Press Relations. Copy has stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations.
